---
title: "K2 admixture proportions"
output: html_notebook
---

```{r libraries}
library(tidyverse)
source("visFuns.R")
```


```{r metadata}
metadata <- read_csv("data/trout_mix_1_metadata.csv")
pop <- data.frame(metadata$NMFS_DNA_ID...1, metadata$COUNTY_F, metadata$WATER_NAME)
pop <- pop %>% filter(!row_number() %in% 89)
```


```{r ordering}

```


```{r rep_1}
q <- read.table("data/maf_0.05/K_2_rep_1/output.qopt")
ord <- orderInds(pop = as.vector(pop[,3]), q = q)

barplot(t(q),
        col = c("darkgrey",
                "lightgrey"),
        space = 0,
        border = NA,
        xlab = "Individuals",
        ylab = "Admixture proportions for K = 2, rep 1")
```
